body:
I was playing Nexus today and people were telling me I was lagging because I couldn't see them and I kept dying. I restarted mine craft and got back in, I was still lagging so I went back into Nexus. I didn't know which map we were playing so I just ran around swinging the sword at people. My mine craft game crashed then I went back in and saw I was banned. 

It said Kicked whilst connecting to Hub3: You have been banned
                                                       Reason: Hacking
                                                       Date: 22/12/14
I dont know if its true or not. But I don't hack but ill take it anyway. Although is there anyway I can get unbanned because its my favourite server and only.

title: Banned?

replies.body: Please do not create threads around this topic. To appeal use the Avicus email  support@avicus.net. Make sure your email has your username and reasons regarding the appeal.
